citation: Electricity Supply Industry Restructuring (Savings and Transitional Provisions) Amendment Order 2021 (Tas)
text:
Electricity Supply Industry Restructuring (Savings and Transitional Provisions) Amendment Order 2021

I make the following order under section 16D of the Electricity Supply Industry Restructuring (Savings and Transitional Provisions) Act 1995 .

6 July 2021

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Electricity Supply Industry Restructuring (Savings and Transitional Provisions) Amendment Order 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Electricity Supply Industry Restructuring (Savings and Transitional Provisions) Order 2020 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Electricity Supply Industry Restructuring (Savings and Transitional Provisions) Order 2020 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 July 2021

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
